AR 1. When conducting a materiality assessment on environmental subtopics, the undertaking
shall assess the materiality of water and marine resources in its own operations and its
upstream and downstream value chain, and may consider the four phases below, also known
as the LEAP approach:
(a) Phase 1: locate where in its own operations and along the value chain the interface
with nature takes place;
